name: Mikado
shortDescription:
Identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data 
 main pipeline

details.label: mutation file
details.description:
List of the inputs, one by line, in the form: 
 <file1>  <label>  <strandedness (true/false)>

details.label: label
details.description: Labels to attach to the IDs of the transcripts of the input files, separated by comma.

details.label: if given gff files and a list file or just the first ones
details.description:
--gff= Input GFF/GTF file(s), separated by comma 
 --list= List of the inputs, one by line, in the form: 
 <file1>  <label>  <strandedness (true/false)>

details.label: configure mode
details.description:
Mode in which Mikado will treat transcripts with multiple ORFs. 
 - nosplit: keep the transcripts whole. 
 - stringent: split multi-orf transcripts if two consecutive ORFs have both BLAST hits and none of those hits is against the same target. 
 - lenient: split multi-orf transcripts as in stringent, and additionally, also when either of the ORFs lacks a BLAST hit (but not both). 
 - permissive: like lenient, but also split when both ORFs lack BLAST hits 
 - split: split multi-orf transcripts regardless of what BLAST data is available.

details.label: scoring file
details.description: If no file was uploaded by the user {plants.yaml,human.yaml,insects.yaml,worm.yaml} are the available scoring files

details.label: strand specific assemblies
details.description: List of strand-specific assemblies among the inputs.

details.label: strand specific
details.description: Flag. If set, monoexonic transcripts will be left on their strand rather than being moved to the unknown strand.

details.label: lenient
details.description: Flag. If set, transcripts with only non-canonical splices will be output as well.

details.label: minimum transcript length
details.description: Minimum length for transcripts. Default: 200 bps.

details.label: strip cds
details.description: Boolean flag. If set, ignores any CDS/UTR segment.

details.label: max regression
details.description: Amount of sequence in the ORF (in %) to backtrack in order to find a valid START codon, if one is absent.

details.label: max target sequences
details.description: Maximum number of target sequences.

details.label: discard definition
details.description: Flag. If set, the sequences IDs instead of their definition will be used for serialisation.

details.label: log level of serialise step
details.description: Log level. Default: INFO

details.label: prefix
details.description: Prefix for the genes. Default: Mikado

details.label: no cds
details.description: Flag. If set, not CDS information will be printed out in the GFF output files.

details.label: flanking distance
details.description: Flanking distance (in bps) to group non-overlapping transcripts into a single superlocus.

details.label: purge
details.description: Flag. If set, the pipeline will suppress any loci whose transcripts do not pass the requirements set in the JSON file.

details.label: verbosity of pick step
details.description: if --verbose is set the DEBUG mode will be activated

details.label: log level of pick step
details.description: Log level
